data.command:
mkdir -p /tmp/atomic-test-T1036.006
cd /tmp/atomic-test-T1036.006
mkdir -p 'testdirwithspaceend '
[ "$(uname)" = 'FreeBSD' ] && /bin/echo "#\!/bin/sh" > "testdirwithspaceend /init " && echo 'echo "print("running T1035.006 with space after filename to masquerade init")" | python3.9' >> "testdirwithspaceend /init " && echo "exit" >> "testdirwithspaceend /init " || /usr/bin/echo -e "%d
a
#!/usr/bin/perl
print "running T1035.006 with space after filename to masquerade init\n";
qx/cp /usr/bin/perl 'init  '/;
qx/'./init  ' -e 'sleep 5'/;
.
wq
" | ed 'testdirwithspaceend /init ' >/dev/null
chmod +x 'testdirwithspaceend /init '
'./testdirwithspaceend /init '
